EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Single Page App-Spring Security-AngularJS.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for tomorrow's webinar A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS with David Syer. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, March 10, 2015
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e45c5c49bd89364cf3c822c5f0682df68> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 583 046
Thank you,
